mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_용어기본 조회 (TrmMapper.getTrm) */ SELECT std_trm_nm ,sys_se_nm ,artcl_sou_nm ,std_trm_eng_abbr_nm ,atrb_type_nm ,com_std_dmn_nm ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TRM" WHERE 1=1 AND std_trm_nm = #{stdTrmNm}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_용어기본 수정 (TrmMapper.updateTrm) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TRM" SET sys_se_nm = coalesce(#{sysSeNm}, sys_se_nm) ,artcl_sou_nm = coalesce(#{artclSouNm}, artcl_sou_nm) ,std_trm_eng_abbr_nm = coalesce(#{stdTrmEngAbbrNm}, std_trm_eng_abbr_nm) ,atrb_type_nm = coalesce(#{atrbTypeNm}, atrb_type_nm) ,com_std_dmn_nm = coalesce(#{comStdDmnNm}, com_std_dmn_nm) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND std_trm_nm = #{stdTrmNm}
